ivardefs.name: content
ivardefs.desc: How much of the resource content to deliver in the notification payload. The choices are an empty payload, only the resource id, or the full resource content.

ivardefs.name: contentType
ivardefs.desc: The mime type to send the payload in - either application/fhir+xml, or application/fhir+json. The MIME types "text/plain" and "text/html" may also be used for Email subscriptions.

properties.desc: The payload mimetype and content.  If the payload is not present, then there is no payload in the notification, just a notification.
